statements.select:
SELECT A.* , B.* FROM T_DOBJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DPROBLEMS_LIBRARY B ON B.OID = A.OID WHERE A.DeleteDt IS NULL AND A.Type = 'ECONTENT'
AND A.OID = #OID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DPROBLEMS_LIBRARY ( OID , Car_Lib_OID , Product , Part , Occurrence , Stage_Occurrence , Failure_Type , Division , Issues , Issues_Thumbnail , Cause , Cause_Thumbnail , Countermeasures , Countermeasures_Thumbnail ) VALUES ( #OID# , #Car_Lib_OID# , #Product# , #Part# , #Occurrence# , #Stage_Occurrence# , #Failure_Type# , #Division# , #Issues# , #Issues_Thumbnail# , #Cause# , #Cause_Thumbnail# , #Countermeasures# , #Countermeasures_Thumbnail# )
